hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #1# major item.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Map of the Forest Temple#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest
